body_html: Hi, @shreyneil , It works on r1.1.0(another machine with 11G video memory). When I decrease my tensorflow to r1.1.0, it still works wrong (Only 6G video memory). What's your machine configuration? Does the video memory is the main reason?

body: Hi, @shreyneil , It works on r1.1.0(another machine with 11G video memory). When I decrease my tensorflow to r1.1.0, it still works wrong (Only 6G video memory). What's your machine configuration?  Does the video memory is the main reason?
